rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: At the beginning of the interaction with a patient.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling. Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: After the patient indicates their new or established status.
rules.action: Acknowledge the customer's status before proceeding to request further information.
rules.example: Okay, thank you for letting me know you're an established patient.

rules.title: Request Established Patient ID
rules.condition: If the patient is identified as established.
rules.action: Ask for identifying information such as a phone number or date of birth to locate their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please get your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Inform Chart Retrieval Process
rules.condition: After receiving patient identification information from an established patient.
rules.action: Inform the customer that their chart is being retrieved and they may be placed on a brief hold.
rules.example: Thank you. I'll pull up your chart now, which might take a moment. I may need to place you on a brief hold.

rules.title: Inquire Reason for Visit
rules.condition: After patient identification (or initial intake for new patients) and chart retrieval is indicated.
rules.action: Ask for the specific reason for their call or the type of medical process required.
rules.example: Now that I have your chart open, what can I help you with today? What is the reason for your visit?

rules.title: Ask for Regular Doctor Preference
rules.condition: After determining the reason for the visit and before finalizing location or specific doctor selection.
rules.action: Ask if the patient prefers to schedule with their regular doctor or is open to other providers.
rules.example: Would you like to schedule with your regular doctor, or are you open to seeing another provider?

rules.title: Confirm Preferred Location
rules.condition: For established patients, after the reason for the visit has been determined.
rules.action: Confirm the patient's preferred or usual clinic location for their appointment.
rules.example: And for your appointment, would you prefer to visit your usual clinic location or another one of our offices?

rules.title: Confirm Doctor and Location Availability
rules.condition: After the patient expresses a preference for a specific doctor or clinic location.
rules.action: Confirm the availability of the preferred doctor at the specified location and communicate the findings to the patient.
rules.example: Let me check Dr. Smith's availability at our downtown clinic for you. One moment.

rules.title: Maintain Polite Language
rules.action: Use polite, clear, and professional language.
rules.example: Certainly, I'd be happy to assist you with that. Please allow me a moment.
